post.content:
At Bank of Montreal, we believe in our people, and we provide them with a positive environment in which they can reach their full potential. As one of North America's premier financial institutions, with more than 30 lines of business within our group of companies, we are always looking for new and exciting ways to serve our clients. It is a dynamic work environment that makes good business sense.


Be part of a small team of approximately six individuals in the Market Risk application area.



Develop new applications and provide application support in both production and UAT/test environments for market risk management applications
Enhance system features and resolve application production problems as requested by users
Write high-quality and well-documented code using C++ and Unix scripts following the department's coding standard
Write and execute test cases, assist with integration and UAT
Assist System Administrators with software configuration management and implementation



work with our Infinity application (vendor is Sungard)
initially 50% new development and 50% maintenance & support then flexibility on upcoming projects
deal with internal market risk clients
must be able to work independently but be a team player in helping team achieve goals
important to have positive attitude, make judgement calls, be motivated and flexible



Over 7 years of hands-on experience with C++, UNIX script languages, Sybase and/or Oracle
Familiar with Unix Sun OS/Solaris, AutoSys (Unix job scheduler), ClearCase and DDTS are beneficial
Ability to manage multiple tasks in a fast-paced work environment
Demonstrated flexibility and initiative
Knowledge of Risk Management or Derivatives is mandatory and especially with popular vendor such as Summit, Eagle, Infinity or RiskWatch
extensive business knowledge mandatory such as: building derivatives pricing model, quantitative analytics, valuation, market & credit risk, pricing algorithms, etc.
University degree in Computer Science, Engineering or equivalent
an advanced degree in Mathematics or risk management courses are advantageous
Successful applicant may need to be available for on-call duties after hours although it will be minimal
The successful candidate may be required to participate in system integration test for certain risk applications. The incumbent will also be process oriented and will be involved in some project implementation work in the team.


Bank of Montreal thanks all applicants. We advise that only those who qualify for an interview will be contacted.


We are committed to an equitable workplace and a diverse workforce.


Additional Information
Position Type: Full Time, Permanent
Ref Code: DSBJC00648
